title: Crime Alert 04.08.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.08.20
description:
Husband is angry he doesn't qualify for coronavirus stimulus package so he tries to set his disabled wife on fire. Teens arrested for skateboarding on roof.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
